Privacy_Policy:
PrivacyPolicy1 一般信息
1.1 一般信息
数据保护是英飞凌及其集团公司的重中之重。我们遵守业务所在国家/地区的数据保护
法规。内部数据保护规定确保英飞凌集团内所有公司都采用一致的高水平数据保护标
准。我们的员工有义务遵守法律和内部数据保护规定，并将您的数据视为机密。
全面的运作、技术和组织安全措施可以保护您的数据免遭未经授权人员的意外或故意操
纵、丢失、销毁和访问。我们会定期审查安全措施，使其适应技术进步。
1.2 英飞凌数据保护责任
负责实施数据保护规定的一方（“控制方”）是：
英飞凌科技（中国）有限公司
中国（上海）自由贸易试验区川和路 55 弄 4 号 1-4 层
您可以通过以下方式联系集团数据保护官及职员：
英飞凌科技（中国）有限公司
中国（上海）自由贸易试验区川和路 55 弄 4 号 1-4 层
电子邮箱：dataprotection.china@infineon.com
1.3 对数据隐私声明的修改
我们的数据隐私声明可能会不定期修改，以确保其符合当前的法律规定或执行因我们的
服务和产品的变更/扩展而产生的更新。新的数据隐私声明将于您下次浏览我们网站时
自动生效。
1 General Information
1.1 Introduction
Data protection has a high priority for Infineon and its group companies. 
We comply with the data protection legislation of the countries in which we 
do business. Internal data protection regulations ensure that consistent 
and high data protection standards apply at all companies within the 
Infineon Group. Our employees are obligated to comply with statutory and 
internal data protection regulations and to treating your data as 
confidential.
Extensive operational, technical and organizational security measures 
protect your data against accidental or deliberate manipulation, loss, 
destruction and access by unauthorized persons. We review our security 
measures regularly and adapt them to technological advances.
1.2 Responsibility for data protection at Infineon
The party responsible (“controller”) for implementing the data protection 
regulations is:
Infineon Technologies China Co. Ltd.
1F-4F No. 4 Lane 55 Chuanhe Road,
Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park
Shanghai
China
You can contact the Group Data Protection Officer and staff at:
Infineon Technologies China Co. Ltd.
1F-4F No. 4 Lane 55 Chuanhe Road,
Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park
Shanghai
China
By e-mail: dataprotection.china@infineon.com
1.3 Amendments to the data privacy statement
Our data privacy statement may be amended at irregular intervals to 
ensure that it complies with current legal requirements or to carry out 
updates arising from changes/expansions to our services and offerings. 
The new data privacy statement will then apply automatically the next 
time you visit our website.
2 您的数据
2.1 我们网站、综合在线服务和门户网站的用户
如果您是我们网站、综合在线服务和门户网站的用户，我们会处理您通过联系我们或注
册使用我们提供的服务等方式主动自愿提供的个人数据。
该等数据可能包括您的姓名、联系方式（通常是业务详细信息），例如您的邮寄地址、
电子邮箱和电话号码，您使用我们网站上需要注册才能使用的服务所产生的访问数据，
以及有关您的请求、您与我们订立的合同、项目和您的兴趣的信息。
我们还收集和处理您使用的设备发送给我们的技术连接数据（例如您的 IP 地址、浏览
器类型、查询的数据和时间）并设置 cookie。点击此处获取有关 cookie 的更多信
息。
我们还收集您使用 XENSIV™产品所探测的数据，包括人流量，设备电流，电压数
据。该等信息将被存储在阿里云服务器内，其存储及传输的相关行为均并受制于阿里云
隐私政策。
处理儿童个人数据的信息
为了保护儿童，英飞凌决定不处理 13 岁以下人员（儿童）的数据。因此，未满 13 岁
的访客不应向英飞凌提供个人数据，即不应使用要求提供姓名及地址等个人数据的内
容。
2.2 业务合作伙伴
业务合作伙伴是英飞凌与之保持积极业务关系的各方，或英飞凌主动与之建立业务关系
的各方。特别是客户、潜在客户、供应商、销售合作伙伴及服务供应商的联系人，会受
到处理个人数据的影响。
我们通过下列一种或多种途径处理从您那里获得的个人数据：
现有的业务关系
参观贸易展会，出席活动
使用我们的网站、综合在线服务和门户网站
该等数据可能包括您的姓名、业务联系方式，如您的邮寄地址、电子邮箱和电话号码、
付款信息以及有关您的请求、您与我们订立的合同、项目和您的兴趣的信息。
我们还处理来自公共来源、信息数据库和信息提供商（如 LexisNexis）的个人数据。
但是，英飞凌对该等外部来源收集的关于您的个人数据不承担任何责任。如欲进一步了
解 LexisNexis 等提供商如何收集和使用您的个人数据，请阅读他们的数据隐私声明：
https://www.lexisnexis.com/global/privacy/en/article-14-bis.page 。
2.3 处理数据的目的
我们处理您的个人数据的主要目的如下：
⚫ 处理您的查询、订单、申请等；
⚫ 编制、订立和/或执行合同；
⚫ 让您能够使用我们的网站、综合在线服务和门户网站；
⚫ 计划和策划活动；
⚫ 向您发送时事资讯,及其他营销信息；
⚫ 为您提供 XENSIV™产品运行数据和其探测到的数据的下载。
⚫ 通过采取适当的技术和组织措施确保英飞凌设施和我们网站的安全；
⚫ 保护我们的产品免受安全风险和犯罪活动的影响；以及
⚫ 能够建立、行使或抗辩法律主张。
2.4 法律依据
我们会根据下列一项或多项法律依据处理您的个人数据：
⚫ 履行与您订立的合同。
⚫ 遵守法律义务。
⚫ 保护英飞凌的合法权益。英飞凌享有出于下列目的处理您的数据的合法权益：
◼ 提供、运营及改善网站、综合网上服务及门户网站。
◼ 建立和开展业务关系。
◼ 遵守英飞凌自愿遵守的行业及其他标准。
◼ 建立、行使或辩护法律主张。
根据您的个人数据向您发送时事资讯及其他营销信息之前，我们会征求您的同意，您可
以随时撤销该等同意，而无需说明理由。
2.5 传输您的数据
如果您已经同意，或者我们依法有权这样做，我们可能会将您的个人数据转发给英飞凌
集团的其他实体或第三方，特别是选定的服务提供商、分销商、合作伙伴和销售代表。
如果数据被传输到没有足够数据保护水平的第三国家/地区，我们会通过签订符合数据
保护要求的协议，确保您的数据得到充分保护。
只有在国家立法规定的情况下，您的个人数据才会被传输给政府机构及当局。
2.6 数据存储时长
除非有更广泛的法定或合约保留义务（例如商法和税法项下的保留义务），否则您的个
人数据仅在指定用途所需的时间内保留。
2 Your Data
2.1 Users of our website, integrated online services and portals
As users of our website, integrated online services and portals we process 
the personal data that you actively and voluntarily provide us with, for 
example, by contacting us or registering to use services offered by us.
Such data may include your name, your contact details (usually business 
details), such as your mailing address, e-mail address and phone 
number, your access data for using services on our website that are 
subject to registration, as well as information about your request, your 
contracts with us, projects, and your interests.
We also collect and process technical connection data sent to us by the 
device being used by you (such as your IP address, browser type, data 
and time of your query) and set cookies. Click here for more information 
about cookies.
Information on the processing of the personal data of children
To protect children, Infineon has decided not to process data from 
persons under the age of 13 (children). Visitors under the age of 13 
should therefore not make their data available to Infineon, in other 
words, not use the areas in which personal data such as name and 
address are required.
2.2 Business partners
Business partners are all parties with whom Infineon maintains an active 
business relationship or with whom it is initiating such a relationship. In 
particular, contact persons at customers, prospective customers, 
suppliers, sales partners and service providers are affected by the 
processing of personal data.
We process personal data that we receive from you through use of one or 
more of the following channels:
Existing business relationships
Visits to trade fairs, attendance of events
Use of our website, integrated online services and portals
Such data may include your name, your business contact details, such as 
your mailing address, e-mail address and phone number, payment 
information, information about your request, your contracts with us, your 
projects and your interests.
We also process personal data from public sources, information 
databases, and information providers such as LexisNexis. 
Infineon shall, however, not be responsible for the personal data 
collected about you by such external sources. To find out more about 
how, for example, a provider like LexisNexis collects and uses your 
personal data, please read their data privacy statement: 
https://www.lexisnexis.com/global/privacy/en/article-14-bis.page.
2.3 Purpose for processing the data
We process your personal data in particular to
⚫ deal with your queries, orders, applications, etc.,
⚫ prepare, conclude and/or implement contracts,
⚫ enable you to use our website, integrated online services and portals,
⚫ plan and stage events,
⚫ send you newsletters and further marketing information,
⚫ ensure the safety of Infineon facilities and our website through 
appropriate technical and organizational measures,
⚫ protect our products against security risks and criminal activities, and
⚫ enable the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims.
2.4 Legal basis
We process your personal data on the basis of one or more of the 
following legal grounds:
⚫ To perform a contract with you.
⚫ To comply with legal obligations.
⚫ To safeguard Infineon’s legitimate interests. Infineon has legitimate 
interests in processing your data for the following purposes: 
◼ To provide, operate and improve the website, integrated online 
services and portals.
◼ To initiate and conduct business relationships.
◼ To comply with industry and other standards that Infineon has 
voluntarily subjected itself.
◼ To establish, exercise or defend legal claims.
To process your personal data for the distribution of newsletters and 
other marketing information, we ask for your consent, which you may 
revoke at any time without having to state a reason.
2.5 Transfer of your Data
If you have given your consent, or we are otherwise legally entitled to do 
so, we may forward your personal data to other entities of the Infineon 
Group or to third parties, especially to selected service providers, 
distributors, partners, and sales representatives.
If data is transferred to third countries where there is no adequate level 
of data protection, we ensure that your data is protected adequately by 
concluding agreements in compliance with data protection requirements.
Your personal data is transferred to government institutions and 
authorities only if stipulated by national legislation.
2.6 Length of time for which your data is stored
Your personal data is retained only for as long as it is required for the 
specified purposes, unless there are more extensive statutory or 
contractual retention obligations (such as retention obligations under 
commercial and tax law).
3 您的权利
3.1 数据主题的权利
您有权要求英飞凌向您提供其存储的关于您的个人数据的访问权限和信息。您亦有权要
求更正和删除数据或限制处理该等数据，以及要求将存储的数据以适当形式传输给您或
您指定的第三方。
您可以反对将您的个人数据作直接广告之用。如果我们处理您的个人数据是为了保护英
飞凌的合法权益，您可以根据您的具体情况反对此处理。届时我们将停止处理您的数
据，除非它主要用于为值得我们保护的权益服务。
3.2 撤销同意
您向我们作出的同意声明是自愿性质的，您可以随时根据相应目的撤销该等同意，并保
留日后的效力。无法追溯地撤销同意，因为数据一旦被处理了，就无法予以撤销。
3.3 提出投诉的权利
您可以联系我们的数据保护官（见上文）或数据保护监督机构。
3.4 您有权要求英飞凌提供我们所存储的关于您个人资料的信息。此外，您有权要求更正、
删除、限制、拒绝处理数据，并向您或您指定的第三方以合适的形式传输所存储的数
据。您可以通过电话、电子邮件或书面形式执行您的权利。当使用个人资料（例如，
MyInfineon、申请人门户网站、Eloqua）时，您可以自行更正或删除数据
3 Your Rights
3.1 Rights of data subjects
You have the right to demand that Infineon provide you with access to 
and information on the personal data it has stored concerning you. You 
also have the right to demand rectification and erasure of data or 
restriction to processing of it, as well as the right to demand that the 
stored data be transferred to you or a third party named by you in a 
suitable form.
You may object to the processing of your personal data for purposes of 
direct advertising. If we process your personal data to protect Infineon’s 
legitimate interests, you may object to this processing for reasons based 
on your specific situation. We will then stop processing your data unless 
it is predominantly used to serve interests worthy of protection on our 
part.
3.2 Withdrawal of consent
The declarations of consent you give us are voluntary and you can 
withdraw them in relation to the respective purposes at any time with 
future effect. Consent cannot be withdrawn retroactively since, once data 
has been processed, processing of it cannot be undone.
3.3 Right to lodge a complaint
You may contact our Data Protection Officer (see above) or the 
competent data protection supervisory authority.
3.4 You have the right to request information from Infineon about the 
personal data that we have stored about you. In addition, you have the 
right to demand that the data be corrected, deleted, restricted, refused 
to be processed and that you or a third party named by you be 
transferred the stored data in a suitable form. You can exercise your 
rights by telephone, e-mail or in writing. When using a profile (e.g. 
MyInfineon, the Portal, Eloqua) you can correct or delete the data by 
yourself
4 英飞凌的在线服务
4.1 生成图表和下载数据
我们的网站为您提供将设备数据生成默认图表展示的功能，并提供下载设备数据的功
能。
4 Online Service
4.1 Create form and download data
Our website offers you default tables based on the data device send, and 
you could download the data from our website.
5 Cookie
5.1 Cookie
我们的网站使用 cookie。cookie 是存储在您计算机上的小型文本文件。cookie 可让
您的浏览器识别您和您在网站上的最新设置（语言、登录状态等）。您的设置立即可
用，从而确保您可以按预期使用网站。
我们还使用 cookie 来记住您使用网站的偏好，以便根据您的个人兴趣和需要调整显示
的内容。
您可以调整您的浏览器，以通知您所设置的 cookie，也可以根据具体情况进行设置，
允许在某些情况下接受 cookie 或通常情况下不接受，并在关闭浏览器时自动删除
cookie。停用 cookie 可能会限制本网站的功能。
5 Cookies
5.1 Cookies
Our website uses cookies. A cookie is a small text file that is stored on 
your computer. A cookie enables your browser to recognize you and your 
most recent settings (language, login status, etc.) on the website. Your 
settings are available immediately and thus ensure that you can use the 
website as intended.
We also use cookies that remember your preferences for using a website 
in order to adjust the content displayed to your personal interests and 
needs.
You can adjust your browser to inform you of cookies being set and 
permit this on a case-by-case basis only, permit the acceptance of 
cookies in certain cases or generally exclude it, as well as automatically 
delete cookies when you close the browser. Deactivating cookies may 
restrict the functionality of this website.
6 本文件用中英文书写。中文条款仅供参考，两种语言若有任何不一致歧义，以英文条款为
准。
6 This document is written in both English and Chinese. The Chinese is for 
reference only and English language shall prevail in case of discrepancy.
7 我们只会在英飞凌集团和第三方之间传输您的数据，特别是我们的分销伙伴，前提是这符
合合同或您的利益。
7 We will only transfer your data between Infineon groups and third parties, in 
particular our distribution partners, provided that this is in the contract or in your 
interest.
8 只有在强制性的国家法律规定的情况下才能向国家机构和当局传输信息。
8 Information may be transmitted to national institutions and authorities only 
under mandatory national legislation.
Terms_of_Use:
1 范围
任何对于英飞凌集团（以下简称“英飞凌”）下网址为 https://iot-xensiv.infineon-autoeco.com 
(以下简称“网站”）的使用都将遵守这些使用条款。
1 Scope
Any use of this web site provided by Infineon Technologies China (hereinafter “Infineon“) 
under the URL https://iot-xensiv.infineon-autoeco.com (hereinafter “Web Site“) is subject to 
these Terms of Use.
2 网站
2.1 英飞凌致力于支持和维护网站。然而，英飞凌并不保证网站始终是可访问的。英飞凌
也不保证网站始终是最新的，网站上的信息是完整并且没有任何错误的。信息延误、措辞错
误、遗漏和错误信息是有可能存在的。
2.2 英飞凌保留随时更改使用条款以及网站内容和结构的权利，包括保留对网站上某些合
约、服务和/或产品收取费用的权利，或保留不再提供此类合约、服务和/或产品的权利。
2 Web Site
2.1 Infineon endeavors to diligently support and maintain the Web Site. However, 
Infineon does not warrant or guarantee that the Web Site is accessible at all times. Infineon 
also does not warrant or guarantee that the Web Site is always up to date and that the 
information on the Web Site is complete and free from errors at all times. Delays, wording 
mistakes, omissions and wrong information may occur.
2.2 Infineon reserves the right to change these Terms of Use as well as the content and 
structure of the Web Site at any time. This includes the right to claim fees for certain offers, 
services and/or products on the Web Site or to no longer provide such offers, services 
and/or products.
3 使用权和使用限制
3.1 网站的所有用户都需为其在网站的所有活动负责，并必须遵守所有适用的法律。
3.2 本网站所提供的信息、资料和文件（以下简称“材料”）受著作权法、国际著作权条约和
与知识产权有关的其他法律和公约的保护。除本文所述外，这些材料不得在未经英飞凌事先书
面同意的情况下以任何形式或以任何方式进行复制、修改、展示或分发。
英飞凌将允许下载、复制、展示和分发在本网站上发布的材料，但仅限用于非商业或个人用
途，前提是不修改这些材料，保留所有版权和所有权声明，并声明材料的来源是英飞凌。
英飞凌进一步允许教育机构（特别是大学）下载、复制、展示和分发在本网站上发布的材料，
但仅限于作为课堂材料使用，前提是此类机构声明材料的来源是英飞凌。
法律明令禁止未经授权使用任何英飞凌在本网站上发布的材料，违反者可能受到民事和刑事处
罚。
3.3 任何可从本网站下载的软件（以下简称“软件”）受版权保护。 软件的使用受相应许可
协议的条款（如果有）约束，该许可协议随附在软件中（以下称“许可协议”）。 在同意许可协
议条款之前，用户将不能安装任何附带或包含许可协议的软件。不按照许可协议复制或再分发
本软件是明令禁止的，而且可能导致民事和刑事处罚。
3.4 旨在使网站无法使用或妨碍使用本网站的用户活动是非法的，可能会根据民法和刑法
受到起诉。
3 Rights of Use and Use Restrictions
3.1 All users of the Web Site are responsible for all of their activities related to the Web 
Site and obliged to comply with all applicable laws.
3.2 The information, material and documentation available on this Web Site (hereinafter 
“Materials”) are protected by copyright laws, international copyright treaties, and other laws 
and conventions related to intellectual property. Except as stated herein, these Materials 
may not be reproduced, modified, displayed or distributed in any form or by any means 
without Infineon’s prior written consent.
Infineon grants permission to download, reproduce, display and distribute the Materials 
posted on this Web Site solely for informational and non-commercial or personal use, 
provided that the user does not modify such Materials, retains all copyright and proprietary 
notices as they appear in such Materials, and identifies Infineon as the source of the 
Materials.
Infineon further grants to educational institutions (specifically universities and grammar 
schools) permission to download, reproduce, display and distribute the Materials posted on 
this Web Site solely for use in the classroom, provided that such institutions identify Infineon 
as the source of the Materials.
Unauthorized use of any of these Materials is expressly prohibited by law, and may result in 
civil and criminal penalties.
3.3 Any software that is made available to download from this Web Site (hereinafter "Software") 
is copyrighted. Use of this Software is governed by the terms of the respective license 
agreement, if any, that accompanies or is included with such Software (hereinafter "License 
Agreement"). A user will be unable to install any Software that is accompanied by or 
includes a License Agreement before first agreeing to the License Agreement terms. Any 
reproduction or redistribution of the Software not in accordance with the License Agreement 
is expressly prohibited, and may result in civil and criminal penalties.
3.4 User activities that aim at rendering the Web Site non-functional or at least obstruct 
the use of the Web Site are unlawful and may be prosecuted on the basis of civil and 
criminal law.
4 用户内容
